title: 3 grams explosives in 5,000 pagers: How Israel carried out covert strike on Hezbollah
content: Explosives embedded in over 5000 pagers by Mossad triggered simultaneous explosions across Lebanon, causing over 11 deaths and injuring more than 3000 people. Hezbollah blamed Israel for the attack and vowed retaliation. Taiwanese company Gold Apollo denied involvement, stating they only authorized the brand and had no part in designing or manufacturing the pagers.
summary: Explosives embedded in over 5000 pagers by Mossad triggered simultaneous explosions across Lebanon, causing over 11 deaths and injuring more than 3000 people. Hezbollah blamed Israel for the attack and vowed retaliation. Taiwanese company Gold Apollo denied involvement, stating they only authorized the brand and had no part in designing or manufacturing the pagers.

title: Trump's town hall event in Michigan: Here are the key takeaways
content: Donald Trump held a town hall in Flint, Michigan, days after surviving a second assassination attempt. He praised Joe Biden and Kamala Harris for their supportive calls. Trump criticized electric vehicle policies and warned about job losses in the auto industry. Sarah Huckabee Sanders contrasted her humility with Kamala Harris's perceived lack of it.
summary: Donald Trump held a town hall in Flint, Michigan, days after surviving a second assassination attempt. He praised Joe Biden and Kamala Harris for their supportive calls. Trump criticized electric vehicle policies and warned about job losses in the auto industry. Sarah Huckabee Sanders contrasted her humility with Kamala Harris's perceived lack of it.

title: Japanese primary school student stabbed in China
Tupperware Brands files for bankruptcy as company seeks 'strategic alternatives'
content: Tupperware Brands Inc and its subsidiaries have filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection in the US. The company will seek court approval to continue operations and initiate a sale process during the proceedings. Tupperware has faced declining sales and financial challenges, aiming to transform into a digital-first, technology-led firm.
summary: Tupperware Brands Inc and its subsidiaries have filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection in the US. The company will seek court approval to continue operations and initiate a sale process during the proceedings. Tupperware has faced declining sales and financial challenges, aiming to transform into a digital-first, technology-led firm.

title: March for Bolivia's ex-President Morales turns violent, as political crisis escalates
content: Thousands of Evo Morales supporters clashed with counterprotesters during a march to La Paz, opposing President Luis Arce's government. The violence erupted when both groups confronted each other on the highway. Morales' followers demand his inclusion in the 2025 presidential election despite a court ruling disqualifying him, deepening political tensions within Bolivia.
summary: Thousands of Evo Morales supporters clashed with counterprotesters during a march to La Paz, opposing President Luis Arce's government. The violence erupted when both groups confronted each other on the highway. Morales' followers demand his inclusion in the 2025 presidential election despite a court ruling disqualifying him, deepening political tensions within Bolivia.

title: S​​upermoon eclipse captivates skies across multiple continents​​
content: A partial lunar eclipse was observed across several continents as the 'harvest moon' entered Earth's shadow for over an hour. This celestial event will be followed by an annular solar eclipse on October 2, visible from places such as Easter Island and Patagonia.
summary: A partial lunar eclipse was observed across several continents as the 'harvest moon' entered Earth's shadow for over an hour. This celestial event will be followed by an annular solar eclipse on October 2, visible from places such as Easter Island and Patagonia.

title: Donald Trump to meet PM Modi amid Quad summit: What's on agenda
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi is scheduled to visit the US from September 21 to 23 for the 4th Quad summit. Although an official meeting with Donald Trump is not listed, PM Modi will engage with key stakeholders in India-US relations. He will address both the Indian community and the United Nations General Assembly during his visit.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi is scheduled to visit the US from September 21 to 23 for the 4th Quad summit. Although an official meeting with Donald Trump is not listed, PM Modi will engage with key stakeholders in India-US relations. He will address both the Indian community and the United Nations General Assembly during his visit.

title: Watch: Brazil mayoral debate spirals out of control after candidate throws chair at rival
Who is Sarah Huckabee Sanders? Arkansas governor slammed for 'shaming' Kamala Harris
content: Governor Sarah Huckabee Sanders criticized Vice President Kamala Harris during a campaign event for Donald Trump in Michigan. Sanders shared an anecdote about her children keeping her humble, contrasting it with Harris. She also criticized Harris's performance on issues like the southern border and inflation, emphasizing the importance of the next presidential election for America's future.
summary: Governor Sarah Huckabee Sanders criticized Vice President Kamala Harris during a campaign event for Donald Trump in Michigan. Sanders shared an anecdote about her children keeping her humble, contrasting it with Harris. She also criticized Harris's performance on issues like the southern border and inflation, emphasizing the importance of the next presidential election for America's future.

title: 'He was so nice to me ...': Trump reveals what Biden & Kamala said after 2nd assassination attempt
content: Donald Trump disclosed that President Joe Biden and Vice President Kamala Harris made supportive calls after a second assassination attempt on him. The gunman was discovered at Trump's golf club in West Palm Beach. Both leaders condemned the violence, but Trump accused them of inciting attacks through their rhetoric, linking it to their political statements.
summary: Donald Trump disclosed that President Joe Biden and Vice President Kamala Harris made supportive calls after a second assassination attempt on him. The gunman was discovered at Trump's golf club in West Palm Beach. Both leaders condemned the violence, but Trump accused them of inciting attacks through their rhetoric, linking it to their political statements.

title: North Korea test-fires missiles toward eastern seas amid nuclear expansion plans
content: North Korea's latest ballistic missile tests have escalated tensions with the US and neighbouring countries. The missiles were launched from an area north of Pyongyang, travelling approximately 400 kilometres. South Korea and Japan confirmed the launches, condemning them as a threat to regional stability. Kim Jong Un aims to rapidly expand North Korea's nuclear arsenal.
summary: North Korea's latest ballistic missile tests have escalated tensions with the US and neighbouring countries. The missiles were launched from an area north of Pyongyang, travelling approximately 400 kilometres. South Korea and Japan confirmed the launches, condemning them as a threat to regional stability. Kim Jong Un aims to rapidly expand North Korea's nuclear arsenal.

title: Fake Kamala hit-and-run story work of Russian propaganda group: Microsoft
content: Microsoft disclosed that a video falsely alleging Kamala Harris was involved in a hit-and-run is Russian propaganda. The video, shared by a fabricated news channel, seeks to influence US public opinion ahead of the presidential election. This demonstrates continued foreign efforts to manipulate American political views.
summary: Microsoft disclosed that a video falsely alleging Kamala Harris was involved in a hit-and-run is Russian propaganda. The video, shared by a fabricated news channel, seeks to influence US public opinion ahead of the presidential election. This demonstrates continued foreign efforts to manipulate American political views.

title: 5 women writers in Booker's final six, a first in its 55-year history
content: The shortlist for the 2024 Booker Prize has been revealed, featuring six titles including Rachel Kushner's 'Creation Lake' and Percival Everett's 'James.' This year marks the highest number of women authors in the prize’s history. The winner will be announced on November 12 and awarded £50,000.
summary: The shortlist for the 2024 Booker Prize has been revealed, featuring six titles including Rachel Kushner's 'Creation Lake' and Percival Everett's 'James.' This year marks the highest number of women authors in the prize’s history. The winner will be announced on November 12 and awarded £50,000.

title: Canada PM Justin Trudeau may face pressure to quit after key poll loss
content: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau's Liberal Party experienced a major defeat by losing a long-held Montreal parliament seat to the Bloc Quebecois in a special election. This is their second significant loss within three months, indicating declining support for the Liberals ahead of the next general election, expected by spring 2025. Trudeau has vowed to lead his party.
summary: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau's Liberal Party experienced a major defeat by losing a long-held Montreal parliament seat to the Bloc Quebecois in a special election. This is their second significant loss within three months, indicating declining support for the Liberals ahead of the next general election, expected by spring 2025. Trudeau has vowed to lead his party.

title: Kate Middleton returns to royal duties after completing cancer treatment
content: Kate Middleton is back to royal duties following the completion of her cancer treatment. She attended a meeting at Windsor Castle for the Early Years campaign. Recently, she announced in a video that she had finished chemotherapy and described the last nine months as very tough for her family. Prince William was away on another engagement.
summary: Kate Middleton is back to royal duties following the completion of her cancer treatment. She attended a meeting at Windsor Castle for the Early Years campaign. Recently, she announced in a video that she had finished chemotherapy and described the last nine months as very tough for her family. Prince William was away on another engagement.

title: Dhaka on Hasina's stay in Delhi: 'Everything doesn't go by law'
content: Bangladesh's interim government announced that former Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina is residing in India after her diplomatic passport was revoked. Her attempts to seek asylum elsewhere have been unsuccessful. Additionally, the government has granted magistracy powers to army officers for two months due to slow progress in improving law and order.
summary: Bangladesh's interim government announced that former Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina is residing in India after her diplomatic passport was revoked. Her attempts to seek asylum elsewhere have been unsuccessful. Additionally, the government has granted magistracy powers to army officers for two months due to slow progress in improving law and order.

title: 'Serial abuser': Sean 'Diddy' Combs denied bail in sex trafficking case
content: Sean 'Diddy' Combs has been denied bail in Manhattan federal court, facing charges of racketeering conspiracy and sex trafficking. Prosecutors accuse him of leading a decade-long criminal operation involving drug-fueled sex shows and obstructing justice. They argue he poses an extreme danger to the community. Combs pleaded not guilty.
summary: Sean 'Diddy' Combs has been denied bail in Manhattan federal court, facing charges of racketeering conspiracy and sex trafficking. Prosecutors accuse him of leading a decade-long criminal operation involving drug-fueled sex shows and obstructing justice. They argue he poses an extreme danger to the community. Combs pleaded not guilty.

title: Melania Trump spotted in New York, Eric had to walk for stepmother's enhanced security
content: Melania Trump was seen with doubled security in New York after a second assassination attempt on Donald Trump. According to a New York Post report, Melania's departure from Trump Tower coincided with the arrival of her stepson Eric Trump. But as the 56th Street was completely closed for Melania's security, Eric had to get out of his car at the 56th and 5th Avenue and walk around 40 feet to the side entrance.
summary: Melania Trump was seen with doubled security in New York after a second assassination attempt on Donald Trump. According to a New York Post report, Melania's departure from Trump Tower coincided with the arrival of her stepson Eric Trump. But as the 56th Street was completely closed for Melania's security, Eric had to get out of his car at the 56th and 5th Avenue and walk around 40 feet to the side entrance.

title: 1,000 bottles of baby oil seized from Diddy's 'freak off' den. Internet calls it disgusting
content: Sean Diddy Combs has been arrested and charged with sex trafficking. The indictment alleges he organized extended sex sessions with male prostitutes forcing women to participate in them for days -- often recording them. Authorities found significant amounts of baby oil, drugs, and illegal firearms during raids on his properties.
summary: Sean Diddy Combs has been arrested and charged with sex trafficking. The indictment alleges he organized extended sex sessions with male prostitutes forcing women to participate in them for days -- often recording them. Authorities found significant amounts of baby oil, drugs, and illegal firearms during raids on his properties.

title: 'Kimberly Guilfoyle probably didn't know about Bettina...': Donald Trump Jr's love life on radar
content: A recent photo of Donald Trump Jr kissing Bettina Anderson has fueled speculation regarding his engagement to Kimberley Guilfoyle. Insiders indicate that Guilfoyle might be unaware or in denial about the relationship. Bettina, a Florida socialite, is often seen with Don Jr, raising questions about their closeness and future plans.
